priorVersion.title: CDISC Protocol Biological Sample Attribute Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C179587

self.title: CDISC Protocol Biological Sample Attribute Terminology

definition: A terminology value set relevant to the attributes of the biological sample.
name: Biological Sample Attribute Terminology
preferredTerm: CDISC Protocol Biological Sample Attribute Terminology

terms.definition: The activities describing the documentation of the storage, inventory tracking, and disposition of the biological sample.
The activities describing biological sample collection, such as specimen type, timing and methodology.
A description of the methodology by which biological material is obtained from a subject.
A description of the timing for the collection of a biological sample, in relation to a study-specific event or time period.
A description of the management of biological sample handling, including methods of collection, processing, shipping, and storage.
The activities describing how the biological sample is made ready for storage, processing, and/or analysis.
A textual description as to whether and/or how biological samples are retained for research purposes.
The activities describing the logistical considerations for transporting a biological sample from the sender to the receiver.
The activities describing the physical or environmental conditions under which the biological sample is maintained.
